data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wpqDHggOTiMQ7kNvgGSxgCd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAFpzhQ61eHXHWFbpHTq2FRuFqR2xk_jpIOgW6pwC3wfA&oe=66DEDC9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZhU5yXqp8a0Q7kNvgH8IWYz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDC1E2ZjdGBLHdenv24ec6uqNWvqH4n-6uqFwP8b2Iyqw&oe=66DEE624)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gYaQ-6DcPgkQ7kNvgHyuS-J&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAnXFEC3iT0EKJ_xd_tuhI0IV3gqmNg7BGDscMmKaXRWQ&oe=66DECD87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=D6XBkfq2QaUQ7kNvgG4b8Xy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAYkCQwx6kgd2NyxeVCJkYOjwrg-ST9EtyncIZzui4B0g&oe=66DEC066)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uv3Ixb6gvvMQ7kNvgFE8qb8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBo9608jEUfa6nxlUxlDwmeGvgGM4ZVGoKp6gyYsE6j3Q&oe=66DEECD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=apk0fbtESKkQ7kNvgFkpkJg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC96SC5tnYxmz6xm1mCzVBQPtDC81u1dFwD1k_bp_M6GA&oe=66DEE959)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XGpA2_JifloQ7kNvgGew3cw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAbWKV4dcRen-RLHsE5gOBLnaw86B5D73JdN05iWfDAdg&oe=66DECF70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pFMoom0S7M0Q7kNvgEhaR8-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDcU3cYR8buI7GgOxMhA-UqlQjh6gDG-dShruYwWteo4A&oe=66DEB9EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ybtu7Zx7e5MQ7kNvgEKHCDP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCuNtFYjD9EGwzy6CaQ1PsWay0-89836VCHXKR1TIizEA&oe=66DECD97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3FJ6V1f7dWoQ7kNvgGP0TgE&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA97LGMdJwDSj1Z9FXVOQq40E9xiXKBPlRQYfzfAFnQ8w&oe=66DEE90C)
